trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Naples
There was one other sighting in Naples on or around November 11th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was smoking a cigarette on my lanai when i notcied some really bright lites, my wife has witnessed a takeoff of a UFO some years back so i called her to look at what i see, i got 2 pairs of binoculars out and stated looking, the one i saw first appears as a ball of mutliple glowing white lites, my wife noticed some others and we looked at them and one in particular is shining brighter than the others, then i saw another moving quickly blinking red then white in sequence, as i pan the sky i can see well over a dozen all with white lites in a circumference around what appears to be transparent, i am charging my video camera with some hope i can get some footage before they leave, i sit out in this same place every night and have never seen anything like this before
